data.name: LocalizerName
data.comment: Will be shown in About dialog

data.name: LocalizerCulture
data.comment: Culture name string (eg: it-IT, fr-FR, en-US, fr)

data.name: LocalizerKey
data.comment: Do not change unless a new key is announced.

data.name: uxTypeVanilla
data.value: Vanilla (same as original installer with WGA)

data.name: uxTypeTweaked
data.value: Tweaked (with registry tweaks and no WGA)

data.name: uxLabelEnterWMPRedistPath
data.value: Enter the full path to the Media Player 11 installation file or use the "..." button to locate it:

data.name: uxLinkWMPRedist
data.value: If you don't have the installation file, click here to download it (Genuine Windows required)

data.name: uxLabelEnterSrcPath
data.value: Enter the path to the Windows source to integrate WMP11 in (must contain a "i386" folder):

data.name: uxLabelEnterHotfixLine
data.value: Use the "..." button to select WMP11 hotfixes to integrate:

data.name: uxCheckboxCustomIcon
data.value: Use a custom icon for wmplayer.exe

data.name: uxCheckboxNoCats
data.value: Do not add security catalogs (for those who disable Windows File Protection)

data.name: dlgText_WmpRedistNotFound
data.value: Windows Media Player 11 installer could not be found. Please locate it and try again.

data.name: dlgText_Wmp64FilesMissing
data.value:
Essential WMP9 and WMP6.4 files are missing from the specified source.
Windows Media Player 11 cannot be integrated into a source from which these two components have been removed with nLite or similar source modification utilities.

data.name: dlgText_InvalidHotfixLine
data.value:
Invalid hotfix line specified or some hotfixes in the list do not exist.
Please reselect hotfixes to integrate and try again.

data.name: dlgError_Header
data.value: An unhandled exception has occurred in the worker thread. Please copy the following diagnostic information and post a bug report.

data.name: dlgError_Footer
data.value: Click on "Close" to return to the application.

data.name: dlgAbout_GotoSite
data.value: Click here to go to the website

data.name: dlgText_Cancelled
data.value: Integration cancelled by user. Source remains unchanged.

data.name: dlgAbout_InfoText
data.value:
This program will slipstream Windows Media Player 11 into your Windows installation source.
Next time you install Windows, Windows Media Player 11 will already be installed, waiting for you to experience the best in digital entertainment.
Note: This program is not developed, maintained, endorsed or supported by Microsoft Corporation in any way.
Do not complain to Microsoft about any problems arising from the use of this program. Use at your own risk.

data.name: dlgPickHotfixes_Title
data.value: Select hotfix(es) to integrate into WMP11:

data.name: dlgSrcPicker_Header
data.value: Choose the Microsoft® Windows™ source to modify (must contain an "i386" folder):

data.name: statWaitCancel
data.value: Waiting for current operation to complete...

data.name: dlgIconError_Text
data.value: The specified file does not seem to be a valid icon.

data.name: errSrcTypeDetectFail
data.value: Failed to detect the source info for this installation source. Unable to select correct fileset.

data.name: errWmpRedistArchMismatch
data.value: This version of the Windows Media Player 11 installer is not compatible with your OS installation source. Make sure that both are 32-bit or x64 versions.

data.name: errWmpRedistNoControlXml
data.value: Invalid WMP11 installer selected. Unable to locate control.xml to verify destination source type.

data.name: errWmpRedistWrongVer
errControlXmlInvalid
data.value: "{0}" does not have the expected elements. Unable to verify compatibility.

data.name: errNoI386RefInX64Src
data.value: Cannot find the index of the 32-bit "i386" folder. This x64 source is corrupt.

data.name: errInvalidSource
data.value: "{0}" does not seem to contain a valid Windows™ source.

data.name: errInvalidX32Src
data.value: "{0}" does not seem to contain a valid 32-bit Windows™ source.

data.name: errInvalidX64Src
data.value: "{0}" does not seem to contain a valid x64 Windows™ source.

data.name: errMissingSetupFileFromArch
data.value: The essential setup file "{0}" is missing from this source. This source is corrupt.

data.name: errDirIdDuplicated
data.value: DirId: "{0}" is defined more than once in "{1}"

data.name: dlgWarnUxtheme_Text
data.value: Please integrate KB908536 after this process is finished, otherwise the "Themes" service will not start after installing Windows from this source.

data.name: dlgWarnOobe_Text
data.value: Please integrate KB894871 after this process is finished, otherwise the OOBE (out-of-box-experience) wizard will not launch on first boot after installing Windows from this source.

data.name: errHotfixArchMismatch
data.value: The hotfix you are trying to slipstream ({0}) is not designed for your target source's CPU architecture. Make sure both are 32-bit or x64 versions.

data.name: errNoInfInHotfix
data.value: Unable to find a suitable information file in "{0}".

data.name: errUnsupportedFixAttempt
data.value:
Attempt to integrate a non-WMP11 hotfix. Offending file: "{0}", belongs to hotfix {1}
You may need an updated version of this program to properly integrate this hotfix.

data.name: errDeltaAPIFailed
data.value: Delta API failed to apply patch "{0}" to the file "{1}".

data.name: errSourceNotSupported
data.value: Cannot integrate WMP11 on a windows source of this type.

data.name: dlgUsageInfo_Text
data.value:
WMP11Slipstreamer.exe /installer:"wmp11-windowsxp-x86-enu.exe" /winsource:"D:\MyWindowsSource" /hotfix:"D:\Hotfixes|WMPHotfix1.exe|WMPHotfix2.exe" /customicon:"[Boooggy|Vista|Custom]" [/customiconpath:"pathToIcon"] /output:"[Normal|Tweaked]" [/nocats] [/slipstream] [/closeonsuccess]
/installer - Specifies the full path to the Microsoft WMP11 redistributable installer. /winsource - Specifies the Windows source to integrate WMP11 in. /hotfix - Specifies additional WMP11 hotfixes to integrate. /output - Specifies the output type of WMP11, allowed values: "Normal" or "Tweaked". /customicon - Specifies a custom icon to use for wmplayer.exe, allowed values: "Boooggy" or "Vista" or "Custom". /customiconpath - Specifies the location of the custom icon to use if /customicon value is "Custom". /nocats - Modifies WMP11 integration so that it no longer includes the security catalogs (only use when disabling WFP). /slipstream - Begins slipstream immediately if no arguments are invalid and all referenced files are present. /closeonsuccess - Exits the slipstreamer after unattended operation is complete (if successful).
